articles.title: On Nantucket, ‘free’ million-dollar houses come with a catch: you have to move them
articles.description:
During Nantucket's house-moving season, people's homes travel the island — sometimes miles away, sometimes a few hundred feet from the eroding coastline.

The post On Nantucket, ‘free’ million-dollar houses come with a catch: you have to move them appeared first on Boston.com.
